input.sentences: i went on vacation last weekend .
i packed my bag and took my cat with me .
i stayed in a place with a blue door .
i planted my flag on the top of the mountain .
at sunset i went to the beach .
output.sentences: I didn't know our weekend vacation was to include traveling on donkeys.
I had packed a bag for my cat, so he could come too.
The house we stayed at had a blue door.
We actually rode those donkeys to the top of a mountain and planted a flag there.
I felt like the sunset over the beach was our prize, later, for all that gruelling effort.
